sentences.en: After assay, we have known the composition of the ore.
sentences.cn: 我们将对他带来的矿石做实验鉴定.

sentences.en: After chemical assay, we have known the composition of the ore.
sentences.cn: 经过化学分析, 我们知道了矿石的构成.

sentences.en: Can be used to assay SOD activity by means of pyrogallol oxidation?
sentences.cn: 邻苯三酚自氧化法适于测定sod活性 吗 ?

sentences.en: Conclusion: Chelex - 100 assay was simple and conventional in extraction of bacteria DNA.
sentences.cn: 结论: Chelex -100 法抽提细菌基因组DNA适用于对大样本牙周炎患者作细菌学检测分析.

sentences.en: Each quantitative analytical procedure should be designed to minimize assay variation.
sentences.cn: 高等每个定量分析方法时都应当要减少其分析误差.

sentences.en: Is 3 half - and - half assay second liver entirely what does negative show?
sentences.cn: 乙肝三对半化验全部为阴性说明什么?

sentences.en: Methods Manner plate assay, contact hemolysis and supernatant assay were used.
sentences.cn: 方法平板检测法, 接触溶血法,上清检测法.

sentences.en: Objective : To develop an HPLC method for assay of ambroxol hydrochloride.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立盐酸氨溴索的HPLC含量测定方法.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To select a better assay method for � � - glucan.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的筛选β - 葡聚糖含量测定的最佳方法.

sentences.en: Objective: to establish a method for assay matrine in Yutaijinzhu cleaning solution.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立玉台净注洗液中苦参碱含量测定方法.

sentences.en: The assay methods of lipase activity were studied in this paper.
sentences.cn: 对检测脂肪酶活力的实验方法迸行了研究.

sentences.en: The assay result of that material is rich in iron.
sentences.cn: 化验结果表明那种物质含铁量丰富.

sentences.en: The most chemically satisfying approach may seem to require the use of the assay system.
sentences.cn: 化学上最理想的探讨途径,似乎需要应用一些鉴定系统.

sentences.en: The pepsin contents of gastric juice were determined by JacalinHRP ELISA assay.
sentences.cn: 方法:采用HRP标记 jacalin,通过elisa法检测各种胃病患者胃液中的胃蛋白酶.

sentences.en: Tissue culture is the most important tool used in virus assay.
sentences.cn: 组织培养是用于病毒试验的最重要的手段.

words.tran_cn: 试金者，尝试者；分析专家
鉴定；经检验证明内含成分

phrases.tran_cn: 酶联免疫吸附测定，酶标法

trans.tran_en: An assay is a test of a substance to find out what chemicals it contains. It is usually carried out to find out how pure a substance is.
to test a substance, especially a metal, to see how pure it is or what it is made of
